headline: Strong Day for Market Indexes - AAPL at New All-Time High
summary: Apple (AAPL) stock rose +3.94% today to $262 per share -- its highest close ever, and the first such all-time closing high since late 2024.

headline: The Government Shutdown Could Be an Opportunity to Buy Defense Stocks
summary: Conservative outlooks while a U.S. government shutdown drags on could present an opportunity to buy aerospace and defense stocks at a discount, according to some Wall Street analysts.

headline: Lockheed Earnings Are Coming. Investors Want Less Drama.
summary: Lockheed  Martin investors want a so-called clean quarter from the defense contractor, which is scheduled to report its earnings before the market opens on Tuesday.  In the second quarter, Lockheed recognized charges amounting to $5.83 a share after tax, for a total of $1.7 billion.  Partly because of that slide, Lockheed stock was up about 4% year to date coming into Tuesday trading, trailing behind the  by about 10 percentage points.

Partly because of that slide, Lockheed stock was up about 4% year to date coming into Tuesday trading, trailing behind the  by about 10 percentage points.
